author: lzybkr
body:
- [] Resolves issue #abcd.
- [x] Code is [rebased](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/git/README.md#sync-your-local-repo) on `origin/master`.
- [] Add tests that fail without your changes.
- [] Update all relevant [documentation](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/tree/master/docs).

This is ongoing work - we could merge or not if it passes CI.
I'm going through old code, introducing some consistency , and mainly using R# to clean things up.

This PR removes unused `using` statements and converts most properties that could be auto-properties into auto-properties.

Lots more cleanup is possible...

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: My concern is that this practically eliminates the ability to merge any more changes from Source Depot, and also makes diffing our changes from master to source-depot impractical. I do _love_ automatic refactoring, but am unsure if we want to pay these costs right now. Of course, this becomes more difficult to do once the repository goes open source (as it disturbs even more developers work-in-progress).

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
Since we already merged roslyn-auto formatter, we should merge this change as well.
Diffing can be done against older tags (for @lzybkr post-factum-uber-review).

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: Changes coming from source depot are minimal now, and as you say, it doesn't make sense to inflict pain unnecessarily on more folks, so it feels like now or never.

title: Cleanup -  - R# refactoring
